RumorFact.Text: Chert radioed me about a strange star that suddenly appeared in an otherwise empty patch of space 2,700 lightyears away. It has a strange luminosity profile - the star itself is nearly dead in the visible range, though the corona could belong to a regular star. Riebeck thinks its sudden appearance may be connected to the Nomai.
The Nomai planed to do something to this former neutron star to turn it into a suitable sun for its formerly icy planet.
